Translations.Text: (meri janib say) keh do kau aey meray bando! Jinhon ney apni jano per ziyadti ki hai tum Allah ki rehmat say na-umeed na hojao bil-yaqeen Allah Taalaa saray gunahon ko bakhash deta hai waqaee woh bari bakhsish bari rehmat wala hai
Tum (sab) apnay perwerdigar ki taraf jhuk paro aur uss ki hukum bardaari kiye jao iss say qabal kay tumharay pass azab aajaye aur phir tumhari madad na ki jaye
Aur pairwee kero uss behtareen cheez ki jo tumhari taraf tumharay perwerdigar ki taraf say nazil ki gaee hai iss say pehlay kay tum per achanak azab aajaye aur tumhen itla bhi na ho
(Aisa na ho kay) koi shaks kahey haaye afsos! Iss baat per kay mein ney Allah Taalaa kay haq mein kotahee ki bulkay mein to mazaq uraney walon mein hi raha
Ya kehey kay agar Allah mujhay hidayat kerta to mein bhi paarsa logon mein hota
Ya azab ko dekh ker kahey kaash! Kay kissi tarah mera lot jana ho jata to mein bhi neko kaaro mein ho jata
Haan (haan) be-shak teray pass meri aayaten phonch chuki thin jinhen tu ney jhutlaya aur ghooroor takabbur kiya aur tu tha hi kafiron mein
Aur jin logon ney Allah per jhoot bandha hai to aap dekhen gay kay qayamat kay din unn kay chehray siyah hogaye hongay kiya takabbur kerney walon ka thikana jahannum mein nahi
Aur jin logon ney perhezgari ki unhen Allah Taalaa unn ki kamyabi kay sath bacha ley ga unhen koi dukh choo bhi na sakay ga aur na woh kissi tarah ghumgeen hongay
Allah her cheez ka peda kerney wala hai aur wohi her cheez per nigehbaan hai
Aasmano aur zamin ki kunjiyon ka malik wohi hai jin jin logon ney Allah ki aayaton ka inkar kiya wohi khasarah paney walay hain
